text:
Hi my friend , first of all wish you a many many happy returns of the day.
I am not able to attent your birthday party and I sorry about that but on that same day I have an important exam to attent. I hope all of you enjoy the party .
I have also send a gift to you. so once again I really sorry and Open the gift as early as possible and Tell me you like it or not. Once again a many many happy returns of the day to you. I wish you all the best and All your dreams come true. After Finishing my exam I will definitely try to visit in your place and I am sure we will enjoy the time together. We will definitely vist to our favorite food place and we will order or favorite burger and fries. Then we will play lots of video games. 
So once again I am sorry but The plan is fix.
Your loving friend,
Atharv

All the best for your match today. Don’t get nervous and just play your natural game. You are already very good player and you know what to do. Give full energy and enjoy the match also. Result will come but performance is important. I am sure you will do great today.

Hi buddy,
You started the new course now and that is very good decision. In starting it may feel little difficult but slowly you will understand everything. Don’t skip the practice and keep learning daily. After some time you will see big improvement. I am always there if you need help. Study well and keep going.
Your friend,
Atharv

Hi buddy,
You started the new course now and that is very good decision. In starting it may feel little difficult but slowly you will understand everything. Don’t skip the practice and keep learning daily. After some time you will see big improvement. I am always there if you need help. Study well and keep going.
Your friend,
Atharv

Hi my friend,
I just heard that you got the new job and I am very very happy for you. You really worked hard for this and you deserve it. This is a big step for your future. I am sure you will do great there also. We will celebrate this very soon. Treat is pending now. Once again many congratulations to you and all the best for your new journey.
Your loving friend,
Atharv

Hi buddy,
Tomorrow is your exam and I just want to say don’t take too much stress. You already studied well and you know many things. Just stay calm and read the questions properly. Give your best and don’t worry about the result. After the exam we will relax and enjoy. I believe in you. All the best for your paper.

Hi my friend,
I heard that you are not well and I hope you are taking proper rest. Health is very important so don’t ignore it. Take your medicines and eat on time. Don’t worry about anything else now. After you get well we will meet and enjoy again. I wish you a fast recovery.
Your loving friend,
Atharv

Hi my friend,
Thank you so much for helping me that day. Without you it was very difficult for me to finish that work. You supported me like a true friend. I will always remember this. Next time whenever you need help I will be there for you. Once again thank you and take care.
Your loving friend,
Atharv

I saw your result and you won the competition. That is really amazing. I am very proud of you. Your hard work finally showed the result. Keep doing this and you will achieve many big things. We must celebrate this soon. Once again congratulations champion.

Hi my friend,
Welcome to the new city. I hope you are feeling comfortable there. Starting is always little difficult but slowly you will like everything. Explore new places and meet new people. If you need any help just call me anytime. Everything will be fine. Best wishes for your new start.
Your loving friend,
Atharv

Hi buddy,
Just reminding you about the work we planned to finish this week. Time is going fast so don’t delay it more. If we complete it now then later we will be relaxed. Let us finish it together and then enjoy without tension. Message me when you start.
Your friend,
Atharv

Hi my friend,
I heard you buy the new phone and that is really very nice. Finally you got it. I know you were planning from long time. Now you will click many photos and play many games also. When we meet you must show me everything about it. I am very excited to see. Enjoy your new phone and use it properly.
Your loving friend,
Atharv
